the automaker's recovery plan after its 2009 bankruptcy filing and near-collapse.`` 2011 needs to be characterized as the year of execution,'' Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne told analysts and journalists during a conference call. We need to execute on what we promised to do. Chrysler, which is now 25 percent owned by Fiat, projected it will sell 2 million cars and trucks worldwide in 2011, up from a little more than 1.5 million in sales in 2010.

Ecco cos` ha detto Eric Schmidt : Larry Page da adesso guider la strategia dello sviluppo dei prodotti e della tecnologia, i suoi principali punti di forza, e a cominciare dal 4 aprile si far carico anche dell` ordinaria amministrazione come Chief Executive Officer di Google. In questo ruolo sono sicuro che fonder perfettamente la visione tecnologica e quella degli affari . La terza entit del triumvirato, Sergey Brin , terr per s il titolo di cofondatore e si concentrer sui nuovi prodotti. Questa? la dichiarazione ufficiale. , 2011| 8:22 AM ET Edgar Bronfman Jr. has been convicted for misleading investors during his time at Vivendi.( Eric Schmidt Thayer/Reuters) A French court has convicted onetime Warner Music CEO Edgar Bronfman Jr. for transmitting false or misleading information during his time as an executive at the former Vivendi conglomerate.
